mapper.insert: insert into commodity_list (cl_number, cl_name, cc_id, cl_spec, us_id, cl_scan, cl_tag_prise, cl_who_price, cl_pur_price) values (#{clNumber}, #{clName}, #{ccId}, #{clSpec}, #{usId}, #{clScan}, #{clTagPrise}, #{clWhoPrice}, #{clPurPrice});
mapper.update: update commodity_list set cl_number=#{clNumber}, cl_name=#{clName}, cc_id=#{ccId}, cl_spec=#{clSpec}, us_id=#{usId}, cl_scan=#{clScan}, cl_tag_prise=#{clTagPrise}, cl_who_price=#{clWhoPrice}, cl_pur_price=#{clPurPrice} where id = #{id}
